title.raw: 卷十 成帝紀 Volume 10: Annals of Emperor Cheng

sentences.zh: 乙未，有司言：「乘輿車、牛馬、禽獸皆非禮，不宜以葬。」

translations.literal: Yiwu, officials said: 'Imperial chariot, oxen horses, birds beasts all not ritual, not proper to bury with.'
translations.idiomatic: On Yiwu, the officials stated: 'The imperial chariot, oxen, horses, birds, and beasts are all against ritual propriety and should not be used in burial.'

sentences.zh: 奏可。

translations.literal: Memorial approved.
translations.idiomatic: The memorial was approved.

sentences.zh: 七月，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Seventh month, great pardon empire.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month, there was a great pardon of the empire.

sentences.zh: 建始元年春正月乙丑，皇曾祖悼考廟災。

translations.literal: Jianshi first year spring first month Yichou, Imperial great-grandfather Dao Kao temple disaster.
translations.idiomatic: On Yichou of the first month of spring in the first year of Jianshi, the temple of the Imperial great-grandfather Dao Kao suffered a disaster.

sentences.zh: 立故河間王弟上郡庫令良為王。

translations.literal: Established former Hejian King younger brother Shangjun storehouse official Liang as king.
translations.idiomatic: The younger brother of the former King of Hejian, Liang the storehouse official of Shangjun, was established as king.

sentences.zh: 有星孛于營室。

translations.literal: There was comet broom at Ying Shi.
translations.idiomatic: There was a comet that swept through Ying Shi.

sentences.zh: 罷上林詔獄。

translations.literal: Abolished Shanglin edict prison.
translations.idiomatic: The Shanglin edict prison was abolished.

sentences.zh: 二月，右將軍長史姚尹等使匈奴還，去塞百餘里，暴風火發，燒殺尹等七人。

translations.literal: Second month, Right General chief clerk Yao Yin etc. envoy Xiongnu return, departed border fortress hundred more li, violent wind fire arose, burned killed Yin etc. seven people.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, Right General's chief clerk Yao Yin and others, envoys to the Xiongnu returning, were more than a hundred li from the border fortress when a violent wind and fire arose, burning and killing Yin and six others.

sentences.zh: 賜諸侯王、丞相、將軍、列侯、王太后、公主、王主、吏二千石黃金，宗室諸官吏千石以下至二百石及宗室子有屬籍者、三老、孝弟力田、鰥寡孤獨錢帛，各有差，吏民五十戶牛酒。

translations.literal: Granted feudal lords kings, Chancellor, generals, marquises, king empress dowagers, princesses, king masters, officials 2000 piculs gold, imperial clan various officials 1000 piculs below to 200 piculs and imperial clan sons having registered ones, three elders, filial younger brothers diligent farmers, widowers widows orphans solitary money silk, each had differences, officials people 50 households oxen wine.
translations.idiomatic: Granted to feudal kings, Chancellor, generals, marquises, king empress dowagers, princesses, king masters, and officials of 2000 piculs: gold. To imperial clan officials from 1000 piculs down to 200 piculs and imperial clan sons with registered status, three elders, filial younger brothers and diligent farmers, widowers, widows, orphans, and the solitary: money and silk, each according to rank. To officials and people: 50 households worth of oxen and wine.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「乃者火災降於祖廟，有星孛于東方，始正而虧，咎孰大焉！

translations.literal: Edict said: 'Recently fire disaster descended on ancestor temples, there was comet broom in east, began correct but deficient, fault who great there!
translations.idiomatic: An edict declared: 'Recently fire disasters descended upon the ancestor temples, there was a comet that swept through the east, beginning correctly but deficient—what fault could be greater!

sentences.zh: 《書》云：『惟先假王正厥事。』

translations.literal: Documents says: 'Only first assist king correct his affairs.'
translations.idiomatic: The Documents says: 'Only first assist the king to correct his affairs.'

sentences.zh: 群公孜孜，帥先百寮，輔朕不逮。

translations.literal: Group dukes diligently diligently, lead first hundred officials, assist I not reach.
translations.idiomatic: The group of dukes diligently and diligently, leading and preceding the hundred officials, assist my shortcomings.

sentences.zh: 崇寬大，長和睦，凡事恕己，毋行苛刻。

translations.literal: Honor magnanimous broad, grow harmonious peaceful, all matters forgive self, not practice harsh severe.
translations.idiomatic: Honor magnanimity and breadth, grow harmony and peacefulness. In all matters forgive oneself, do not practice harsh severity.

sentences.zh: 其大赦天下，使得自新。」

translations.literal: Cause great pardon empire, cause them able self renew.'
translations.idiomatic: Cause a great pardon of the empire, so they may renew themselves.'

sentences.zh: 封舅諸吏光祿大夫關內侯王崇為安成侯。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed maternal uncle various officials Guanglu Grandee Guannei Marquis Wang Chong as Ancheng Marquis.
translations.idiomatic: Enfeoffed maternal uncle's various officials Guanglu Grandee and Guannei Marquis Wang Chong as Marquis of Ancheng.

sentences.zh: 賜舅王譚、商、立、根、逢時爵關內侯。

translations.literal: Granted maternal uncle Wang Tan, Shang, Li, Gen, Fengshi noble rank Guannei Marquis.
translations.idiomatic: Granted maternal uncle Wang Tan, Shang, Li, Gen, and Fengshi the noble rank of Guannei Marquis.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，黃霧四塞，博問公卿大夫，無有所諱。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month, yellow fog four blocked, broadly asked dukes ministers grandees, without having what taboo.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, yellow fog blocked all four directions, and broadly asked the dukes, ministers, and grandees, without any taboos.

sentences.zh: 六月，有青蠅無萬數集未央宮殿中朝者坐。

translations.literal: Sixth month, there were green flies countless ten thousand gathered Weiyang Palace hall middle court officials seats.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, there were green flies numbering countless tens of thousands that gathered in Weiyang Palace hall among the court officials' seats.

sentences.zh: 秋，罷上林宮館希御幸者二十五所。

translations.literal: Autumn, abolished Shanglin palace halls rarely imperial favored ones twenty five places.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, twenty-five places of Shanglin palace halls that were rarely favored by the emperor were abolished.

sentences.zh: 八月，有兩月相承，晨見東方。

translations.literal: Eighth month, there were two moons mutually following, morning seen eastern direction.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, there were two moons that followed each other, seen in the morning in the eastern direction.

sentences.zh: 九月戊子，流星光燭地，長四五丈，委曲蛇形，貫紫宮。

translations.literal: Ninth month Wuzi, shooting star light illuminated ground, long four five zhang, winding snake shape, penetrated Purple Palace.
translations.idiomatic: On Wuzi of the ninth month, a shooting star whose light illuminated the ground, four or five zhang long, winding in snake shape, penetrated the Purple Palace.

sentences.zh: 十二月，作長安南北郊，罷甘泉、汾陰祠。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, made Chang'an north south suburbs, abolished Ganquan, Fenyin sacrifices.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, the north and south suburbs of Chang'an were constructed, and the Ganquan and Fenyin sacrifices were abolished.

sentences.zh: 是日大風，拔甘泉畤中大木十韋以上。

translations.literal: This day great wind, uprooted Ganquan altar middle large trees ten wei above.
translations.idiomatic: On this day there was a great wind that uprooted large trees in the Ganquan altar that were ten wei and above.

sentences.zh: 郡國被災什四以上，毋收田租。

translations.literal: Commanderies kingdoms suffered disaster ten four above, not collect field rents.
translations.idiomatic: For commanderies and kingdoms that suffered disasters of 40% or more, field rents were not collected.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，罷雍五畤。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month, abolished Yong Five Altars.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the second year, the Yong Five Altars were abolished.

sentences.zh: 辛巳，上始郊祀長安南郊。

translations.literal: Xinsi, His Majesty first suburban sacrificed Chang'an south suburb.
translations.idiomatic: On Xinsi, His Majesty first performed suburban sacrifices at Chang'an's south suburb.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「乃者徙泰畤、后土于南郊、北郊，朕親飭躬，郊祀上帝。

translations.literal: Edict said: 'Recently moved Supreme Altar, Houtu to south suburb, north suburb, I personally prepared person, suburban sacrificed Supreme Deity.
translations.idiomatic: An edict declared: 'Recently moved the Supreme Altar and Houtu to the south suburb and north suburb. I personally prepared myself and performed suburban sacrifices to the Supreme Deity.

sentences.zh: 皇天報應，神光並見。

translations.literal: August Heaven responded, divine lights together appeared.
translations.idiomatic: August Heaven responded, and divine lights appeared together.

sentences.zh: 三輔長無共張繇役之勞，赦奉郊縣長安、長陵及中都官耐罪徒。

translations.literal: Sanfu forever without contribute provide corvee services labor, pardon serve suburban counties Chang'an, Changling and central capital officials endure crime convicts.
translations.idiomatic: The Sanfu forever without the labor of contributing and providing corvee services. Pardoned the officials who served the suburban counties of Chang'an and Changling, and the central capital officials who endured punishment as convicts.

sentences.zh: 減天下賦錢，算四十。」

translations.literal: Reduce empire tribute money, poll tax forty.'
translations.idiomatic: Reduce the empire's tribute money and poll tax to forty.'

sentences.zh: 閏月，以渭城延陵亭部為初陵。

translations.literal: Intercalary month, used Weicheng Yanling pavilion department as initial tomb.
translations.idiomatic: In the intercalary month, the Weicheng Yanling pavilion department was used as the initial tomb.

sentences.zh: 二月，詔三輔內郡舉賢良方正各一人。

translations.literal: Second month, edict Sanfu inner commanderies recommend worthy good upright each one person.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, an edict commanded the Sanfu inner commanderies to recommend one worthy and good, upright person each.

sentences.zh: 三月，北宮井水溢出。

translations.literal: Third month, north palace well water overflowed out.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, the north palace well water overflowed.

sentences.zh: 辛丑，上始祠后土于北郊。

translations.literal: Xin Chou, His Majesty first sacrificed Houtu at north suburb.
translations.idiomatic: On Xin Chou, His Majesty first sacrificed to Houtu at the north suburb.

sentences.zh: 丙午，立皇后許氏。

translations.literal: Bingwu, established Empress Xu clan.
translations.idiomatic: On Bingwu, Empress Xu was established.

sentences.zh: 罷六廄、技巧官。

translations.literal: Abolished six stables, skill technique officials.
translations.idiomatic: The six stables and skill technique officials were abolished.

sentences.zh: 夏，大旱。

translations.literal: Summer, great drought.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, there was a great drought.

sentences.zh: 東平王宇有罪，削樊、亢父縣。

translations.literal: Dongping King Yu had crime, pared Fan, Kangfu counties.
translations.idiomatic: Dongping King Yu had a crime and was pared of Fan and Kangfu counties.

sentences.zh: 秋，罷太子博望苑，以賜宗室朝請者。

translations.literal: Autumn, abolished Crown Prince Bowang park, to grant imperial clan morning audience ones.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, the Crown Prince's Bowang park was abolished to grant to imperial clan members who came for morning audience.

sentences.zh: 減乘輿廄馬。

translations.literal: Reduce imperial chariot stable horses.
translations.idiomatic: The imperial chariot stable horses were reduced.

sentences.zh: 三年春三月，赦天下徒。

translations.literal: Third year spring third month, pardon empire convicts.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month of spring in the third year, convicts throughout the empire were pardoned.

sentences.zh: 賜孝弟力田爵二級。

translations.literal: Granted filial younger brothers diligent farmers noble rank two levels.
translations.idiomatic: Filial younger brothers and diligent farmers were granted two levels of noble rank.

sentences.zh: 諸逋租賦所振貸勿收。

translations.literal: All arrears rents tribute what relieved loaned not collect.
translations.idiomatic: All arrears of rents and tribute that were relieved and loaned shall not be collected.

sentences.zh: 秋，關內大水。

translations.literal: Autumn, pass within great flood.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, there was great flooding within the pass.

sentences.zh: 七月，虒上小女陳持弓聞大水至，走入橫城門，闌入尚方掖門，至未央宮鉤盾中。

translations.literal: Seventh month, Buliu upper small girl Chen held bow heard great flood arrived, ran into horizontal city gate, rushed into Shangfang lateral gate, reached Weiyang Palace hooked shield middle.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month, a small girl named Chen from Buliu who held a bow heard the great flood was coming, ran into the horizontal city gate, rushed into the Shangfang lateral gate, and reached the hooked shield in Weiyang Palace.

sentences.zh: 吏民驚上城。

translations.literal: Officials people alarmed ascended city.
translations.idiomatic: Officials and people were alarmed and ascended the city walls.

sentences.zh: 九月，詔曰：「乃者郡國被水災，流殺人民，多至千數。

translations.literal: Ninth month, edict said: 'Recently commanderies kingdoms suffered flood disaster, flowed killed people, many to thousand numbers.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, an edict declared: 'Recently the commanderies and kingdoms suffered flood disasters that flowed and killed people, many reaching thousands in number.

sentences.zh: 京師無故訛言大水至，吏民驚恐，奔走乘城。

translations.literal: Capital without reason false rumor great flood arrived, officials people alarmed frightened, ran walked ascended city.
translations.idiomatic: In the capital there was a groundless false rumor that a great flood had arrived, officials and people were alarmed and frightened, running and ascending the city walls.

sentences.zh: 殆苛暴深刻之吏未息，元元冤失職者眾。

translations.literal: Probably harsh violent profound officials not ceased, common people wronged lost duty ones numerous.
translations.idiomatic: Probably the harsh and violent profound officials have not ceased, and there are many common people who are wronged and have lost their duties.

sentences.zh: 遣諫大夫林等循行天下。」

translations.literal: Sent Remonstrance Grandee Lin etc. tour empire.'
translations.idiomatic: Sent Remonstrance Grandee Lin and others to tour the empire.'

sentences.zh: 冬十二月戊申朔，日有蝕之。

translations.literal: Winter twelfth month Wushen new moon, sun had eclipse of it.
translations.idiomatic: On the new moon which fell on Wushen of the twelfth month of winter, there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 夜，地震未央宮殿中。

translations.literal: Night, earthquake Weiyang Palace hall middle.
translations.idiomatic: At night, there was an earthquake in the middle of Weiyang Palace hall.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「蓋聞天生眾民，不能相治，為之立君以統理之。

translations.literal: Edict said: 'Indeed heard heaven gave birth to multitude people, cannot mutually govern, for them established lord to unify manage them.
translations.idiomatic: An edict declared: 'Indeed I have heard that heaven gave birth to the multitude of people, who cannot govern each other, so for them a lord was established to unify and manage them.

sentences.zh: 君道得，則草木昆蟲咸得其所；

translations.literal: Lord way obtained, then grasses trees insects all obtained their place;
translations.idiomatic: When the lord's way is obtained, then grasses, trees, and insects all obtain their proper place;

sentences.zh: 人君不德，謫見天地，災異婁發，以告不治。

translations.literal: Person lord not virtue, blame appeared heaven earth, disasters anomalies repeatedly arose, to announce not governing.
translations.idiomatic: When the person lord lacks virtue, blame appears in heaven and earth, disasters and anomalies repeatedly arise, to announce poor governance.

sentences.zh: 朕涉道日寡，舉錯不中，乃戊申日蝕地震，朕甚懼焉。

translations.literal: I waded way days few, raised lowered not hit center, then Wushen sun eclipse earthquake, I greatly feared there.
translations.idiomatic: I have waded in the way for few days, my actions and omissions have not hit the center, then on Wushen there was a solar eclipse and earthquake, I greatly fear this.

sentences.zh: 公卿其各思朕過失，明白陳之。

translations.literal: Dukes ministers their each think my faults errors, clearly state them.
translations.idiomatic: Dukes and ministers shall each think about my faults and errors, and clearly state them.

sentences.zh: 『女無面從，退有後言。』

translations.literal: 'You not face follow, retreat have later words.'
translations.idiomatic: 'Do not follow in my face, but have later words after retreating.'

sentences.zh: 丞相、御史與將軍、列侯、中二千石及內郡國舉賢良方正能直言極諫之士，詣公車，朕將覽焉。」

translations.literal: Chancellor, Imperial Secretary together with generals, marquises, middle 2000 piculs and inner commanderies kingdoms recommend worthy good upright able straightforward speak extreme remonstrate gentlemen, go to public carriage, I will view them.'
translations.idiomatic: The Chancellor and Imperial Secretary together with generals, marquises, middle 2000 piculs officials, and inner commanderies and kingdoms shall recommend worthy and good, upright gentlemen able to speak straightforwardly and remonstrate extremely. Go to the public carriage, I will view them.'

sentences.zh: 越嶲山崩。

translations.literal: Yuesui mountain collapsed.
translations.idiomatic: The Yuesui mountain collapsed.

sentences.zh: 四年春，罷中書宦官，初置尚書員五人。

translations.literal: Fourth year spring, abolished central secretariat eunuchs, initially established masters of writing personnel five people.
translations.idiomatic: In spring of the fourth year, central secretariat eunuchs were abolished, and masters of writing personnel were initially established with five people.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，雨雪。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month, rained snow.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, it rained snow.

sentences.zh: 五月，中謁者丞陳臨殺司隸校尉轅豐於殿中。

translations.literal: Fifth month, central usher chief Chen Lin killed Commander of Capital Region Commandant Yuan Feng in hall middle.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, central usher chief Chen Lin killed Commander of the Capital Region Commandant Yuan Feng in the middle of the hall.

sentences.zh: 秋，桃李實。

translations.literal: Autumn, peach plum bore fruit.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, peaches and plums bore fruit.

sentences.zh: 大水，河決東郡金隄。

translations.literal: Great flood, river burst Dongjun Jin dike.
translations.idiomatic: There was a great flood; the river burst the Jin dike in Dongjun.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，御史大夫尹忠以河決不憂職，自殺。

translations.literal: Winter tenth month, Imperial Secretary Grandee Yin Zhong because river burst not worried duty, committed suicide.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, Imperial Secretary Grandee Yin Zhong, because the river burst and he did not worry about his duty, committed suicide.

sentences.zh: 河平元年春三月，詔曰：「河決東郡，流漂二州，校尉王延世隄塞輒平，其改元為河平。

translations.literal: He Ping first year spring third month, edict said: 'River burst Dongjun, flowed drifted two provinces, commandant Wang Yanshi dike blocked immediately pacified, cause change era name to He Ping.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month of spring in the first year of He Ping, an edict declared: 'The river burst in Dongjun, flowing and drifting two provinces. Commandant Wang Yanshi's dike blocked and immediately pacified it. Cause the era name to be changed to He Ping.

sentences.zh: 賜天下吏民爵，各有差。」

translations.literal: Granted empire officials people noble ranks, each had differences.'
translations.idiomatic: Granted the empire's officials and people noble ranks, each according to rank.'

sentences.zh: 夏四月己亥晦，日有蝕之，既。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month Jihai last day, sun had eclipse of it, already.
translations.idiomatic: On the last day which fell on Jihai of the fourth month of summer, there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「朕獲保宗廟，戰戰栗栗，未能奉稱。

translations.literal: Edict said: 'I obtained protect ancestral temples, fearful fearful trembling trembling, not able uphold match.
translations.idiomatic: An edict declared: 'I have obtained to protect the ancestral temples, fearful and trembling, not able to uphold and match.

sentences.zh: 傳曰：『男教不修，陽事不得，則日為之蝕。』

translations.literal: Tradition said: 'Male teaching not cultivated, yang affairs not obtained, then sun does eclipse for it.'
translations.idiomatic: The tradition says: 'If male teaching is not cultivated and yang affairs are not obtained, then the sun eclipses for it.'

sentences.zh: 天著厥異，辜在朕躬。

translations.literal: Heaven manifested its anomaly, guilt in my person.
translations.idiomatic: Heaven has manifested its anomaly; the guilt is in my person.

sentences.zh: 公卿大夫其勉悉心，以輔不逮。

translations.literal: Dukes ministers grandees their diligently entire heart, to assist not reach.
translations.idiomatic: Dukes, ministers, and grandees shall diligently give their entire hearts to assist my shortcomings.

sentences.zh: 百寮各修其職，惇任仁人，退遠殘賊。

translations.literal: Hundred officials each cultivate their duties, sincerely appoint benevolent people, retreat far from cruel vicious.
translations.idiomatic: The hundred officials shall each cultivate their duties, sincerely appoint benevolent people, and retreat far from the cruel and vicious.

sentences.zh: 陳朕過失，無有所諱。」

translations.literal: State my faults errors, without having what taboo.'
translations.idiomatic: State my faults and errors, without any taboos.'

sentences.zh: 大赦天下。

translations.literal: Great pardon empire.
translations.idiomatic: There was a great pardon of the empire.

sentences.zh: 六月，罷典屬國并大鴻臚。

translations.literal: Sixth month, abolished Director of Dependencies merged Grand Herald.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, the Director of Dependencies was abolished and merged into the Grand Herald.

sentences.zh: 秋九月，復太上皇寢廟園。

translations.literal: Autumn ninth month, restored Grand Emperor Ancestor sleeping temple gardens.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month of autumn, the Grand Emperor Ancestor's sleeping temple gardens were restored.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，沛郡鐵官冶鐵飛。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month, Pei commandery iron official smelting iron flew.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the second year, the Pei commandery iron official's smelting iron flew.

sentences.zh: 語在五行志。

translations.literal: Words in Five Phases Records.
translations.idiomatic: The words are in the Five Phases Records.

sentences.zh: 夏六月，封舅譚、商、立、根、逢時皆為列侯。

translations.literal: Summer sixth month, enfeoffed maternal uncle Tan, Shang, Li, Gen, Fengshi all as marquises.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month of summer, maternal uncle Tan, Shang, Li, Gen, and Fengshi were all enfeoffed as marquises.

sentences.zh: 三年春二月丙戌，犍為地震山崩，雍江水，水逆流。

translations.literal: Third year spring second month Bingxu, Qianwei earthquake mountain collapsed, blocked Jiang water, water flowed backward.
translations.idiomatic: On Bingxu of the second month of spring in the third year, Qianwei suffered an earthquake and mountain collapse, blocking the Jiang water, which flowed backward.

sentences.zh: 秋八月乙卯晦，日有蝕之。

translations.literal: Autumn eighth month Yimao last day, sun had eclipse of it.
translations.idiomatic: On the last day which fell on Yimao of the eighth month of autumn, there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 光祿大夫劉向校中祕書。

translations.literal: Guanglu Grandee Liu Xiang collated palace secret books.
translations.idiomatic: Guanglu Grandee Liu Xiang collated the palace secret books.

sentences.zh: 謁者陳農使，使求遺書於天下。

translations.literal: Usher Chen Nong sent, caused seek lost books in empire.
translations.idiomatic: Usher Chen Nong was sent to seek lost books throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 四年春正月，匈奴單于來朝。

translations.literal: Fourth year spring first month, Xiongnu Chanyu came to court.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the fourth year, the Xiongnu Chanyu came to court.

sentences.zh: 赦天下徒，賜孝弟力田爵二級，諸逋租賦所振貸勿收。

translations.literal: Pardon empire convicts, granted filial younger brothers diligent farmers noble rank two levels, all arrears rents tribute what relieved loaned not collect.
translations.idiomatic: The empire's convicts were pardoned, filial younger brothers and diligent farmers were granted two levels of noble rank, and all arrears of rents and tribute that were relieved and loaned shall not be collected.

sentences.zh: 二月，單于罷歸國。

translations.literal: Second month, Chanyu dismissed returned to country.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, the Chanyu was dismissed and returned to his country.

sentences.zh: 三月癸丑朔，日有蝕之。

translations.literal: Third month Gui Chou new moon, sun had eclipse of it.
translations.idiomatic: On the new moon which fell on Gui Chou of the third month, there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 遣光祿大夫博士嘉等十一人行舉瀕河之郡水所毀傷困乏不能自存者，財振貸。

translations.literal: Together with inner commanderies kingdoms recommend upright able straightforward speak extreme remonstrate ones each one person, north border twenty two commanderies recommend brave fierce know military methods ones each one person.'
translations.idiomatic: Together with inner commanderies and kingdoms to recommend upright ones able to speak straightforwardly and remonstrate extremely, each one person, and north border twenty-two commanderies to recommend brave and fierce ones who know military methods, each one person.'

sentences.zh: 封蕭相國後喜為酇侯。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Xiao Chancellor descendant Xi as Tan Marquis.
translations.idiomatic: Enfeoffed Xiao Chancellor's descendant Xi as Marquis of Tan.

sentences.zh: 冬十二月辛亥，大司馬大將軍王商薨。

translations.literal: Winter twelfth month Xinhai, Grand Commander Grand General Wang Shang passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On Xinhai of the twelfth month of winter, Grand Commander and Grand General Wang Shang passed away.

sentences.zh: 是歲，昭儀趙氏害後宮皇子。

translations.literal: This year, Zhaoyi Zhao clan harmed rear palace crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: In this year, Zhaoyi Zhao harmed the crown prince in the rear palace.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，行幸甘泉，郊泰畤。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month, proceeded favored Ganquan, suburban Supreme Altar.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the second year, His Majesty proceeded to Ganquan and performed suburban sacrifices at the Supreme Altar.

sentences.zh: 三月，行幸河東，祠后土。

translations.literal: Third month, proceeded favored Hedong, sacrificed Houtu.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, His Majesty proceeded to Hedong and sacrificed to Houtu.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，立廣陵孝王子守為王。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month, established Guangling Filial King son Shou as king.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, established Guangling Filial King's son Shou as king.

sentences.zh: 冬，行幸長楊宮，從胡客大校獵。

translations.literal: Winter, proceeded favored Changyang palace, followed Hu guests great hunt.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, His Majesty proceeded to Changyang palace and followed the Hu guests in a great hunt.

sentences.zh: 宿萯陽宮，賜從官。

translations.literal: Lodged Ceiyang palace, granted attendant officials.
translations.idiomatic: Lodged at Ceiyang palace and granted the attendant officials.

sentences.zh: 三年春正月丙寅，蜀郡岷山崩，雍江三日，江水竭。

translations.literal: Third year spring first month Bing Yin, Shu commandery Min mountain collapsed, blocked Jiang three days, Jiang water dried up.
translations.idiomatic: On Bing Yin of the first month of spring in the third year, Shu commandery's Min mountain collapsed, blocking the Jiang for three days, and the Jiang water dried up.

sentences.zh: 二月，封侍中衛尉淳于長為定陵侯。

translations.literal: Second month, enfeoffed Attendant Commander of the Guards Chunyu Chang as Dingling Marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, enfeoffed Attendant and Commander of the Guards Chunyu Chang as Marquis of Dingling.

sentences.zh: 三月，行幸雍，祠五畤。

translations.literal: Third month, proceeded favored Yong, sacrificed Five Altars.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, His Majesty proceeded to Yong and sacrificed at the Five Altars.

sentences.zh: 四年春正月，行幸甘泉，郊泰畤。

translations.literal: Fourth year spring first month, proceeded favored Ganquan, suburban Supreme Altar.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the fourth year, His Majesty proceeded to Ganquan and performed suburban sacrifices at the Supreme Altar.

sentences.zh: 二月，罷司隸校尉官。

translations.literal: Second month, abolished Commander of Capital Region Commandant office.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, the Commander of the Capital Region Commandant office was abolished.

sentences.zh: 三月，行幸河東，祠后土。

translations.literal: Third month, proceeded favored Hedong, sacrificed Houtu.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, His Majesty proceeded to Hedong and sacrificed to Houtu.

sentences.zh: 甘露降京師，賜長安民牛酒。

translations.literal: Sweet dew descended capital, granted Chang'an people oxen wine.
translations.idiomatic: Sweet dew descended on the capital, and Chang'an people were granted oxen and wine.

sentences.zh: 綏和元年春正月，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Suihe first year spring first month, great pardon empire.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the first year of Suihe, there was a great pardon of the empire.

sentences.zh: 二月癸丑，詔曰：「朕承太祖鴻業，奉宗廟二十五年，德不能綏理宇內，百姓怨望者眾。

translations.literal: Second month Gui Chou, edict said: 'I bear Grand Ancestor great enterprise, serve ancestral temples twenty five years, virtue cannot pacify govern within domain, common people resent hope ones numerous.
translations.idiomatic: On Gui Chou of the second month, an edict declared: 'I bear the Grand Ancestor's great enterprise, have served the ancestral temples for twenty-five years, my virtue cannot pacify and govern within the domain, and the common people who resent and hope are numerous.

sentences.zh: 不蒙天祐，至今未有繼嗣，天下無所係心。

translations.literal: Not receive heaven blessing, until now not have successor heir, empire nothing attach heart.
translations.idiomatic: Not receiving heaven's blessing, until now there has been no successor heir, and the empire has nothing to attach its heart to.

sentences.zh: 觀于往古近事之戒，禍亂之萌，皆由斯焉。

translations.literal: Observe at past ancient recent affairs warnings, calamities disorders sprouts, all from this there.
translations.idiomatic: Observing the warnings of past ancient and recent affairs, the sprouts of calamities and disorders all come from this.

sentences.zh: 定陶王欣於朕為子，慈仁孝順，可以承天序，繼祭祀。

translations.literal: Dingtao King Xin to me is son, compassionate benevolent filial obedient, can bear heaven order, continue sacrifices.
translations.idiomatic: Dingtao King Xin is my son, compassionate, benevolent, filial, and obedient, and can bear the heaven's order and continue the sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 其立欣為皇太子。

translations.literal: Cause establish Xin as crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: Cause Xin to be established as crown prince.

sentences.zh: 封中山王舅諫大夫馮參為宜鄉侯，益中山國三萬戶，以慰其意。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Zhongshan King maternal uncle Remonstrance Grandee Feng Can as Yixiang Marquis, increased Zhongshan kingdom 30,000 households, to console his intention.
translations.idiomatic: Enfeoffed Zhongshan King's maternal uncle Remonstrance Grandee Feng Can as Marquis of Yixiang, increased the Zhongshan kingdom by 30,000 households, to console his intention.

sentences.zh: 賜諸侯王、列侯金，天下當為父後者爵，三老、孝弟力田帛，各有差。」

translations.literal: Granted feudal lords kings, marquises gold, empire should succeed fathers ones noble rank, three elders, filial younger brothers diligent farmers silk, each had differences.'
translations.idiomatic: Granted feudal kings and marquises gold, throughout the empire those who should succeed their fathers noble rank, three elders, filial younger brothers and diligent farmers silk, each according to rank.'

sentences.zh: 又曰：「蓋聞王者必存二王之後，所以通三統也。

translations.literal: Further said: 'Indeed heard kings must preserve two kings descendants, in order to penetrate three systems also.
translations.idiomatic: Further declared: 'Indeed I have heard that kings must preserve the descendants of two kings, in order to penetrate the three systems.

sentences.zh: 昔成湯受命，列為三代，而祭祀廢絕。

translations.literal: Formerly Cheng Tang received mandate, ranked as three generations, and sacrifices abolished extinguished.
translations.idiomatic: Formerly Cheng Tang received the mandate, was ranked as the three generations, and the sacrifices were abolished and extinguished.

sentences.zh: 考求其後，莫正孔吉。

translations.literal: Examine seek their descendants, none correct Kong Ji.
translations.idiomatic: Examined and sought their descendants, none was as correct as Kong Ji.

sentences.zh: 其封吉為殷紹嘉侯。」

translations.literal: Cause enfeoff Ji as Yin Shaojia Marquis.'
translations.idiomatic: Cause Ji to be enfeoffed as Yin Shaojia Marquis.'

sentences.zh: 三月，進爵為公，及周承休侯皆為公，地各百里。

translations.literal: Third month, advanced noble rank to duke, and Zhou Chenghou Marquis all to dukes, lands each 100 li.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, advanced noble rank to duke, and Zhou Chenghou Marquis all to dukes, with lands each 100 li.

sentences.zh: 行幸雍，祠五畤。

translations.literal: Proceeded favored Yong, sacrificed Five Altars.
translations.idiomatic: His Majesty proceeded to Yong and sacrificed at the Five Altars.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，以大司馬票騎大將軍根為大司馬，罷將軍官。

translations.literal: Summer fourth month, used Grand Commander Cavalry Grand General Gen as Grand Commander, abolished general office.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, Grand Commander Cavalry Grand General Gen was used as Grand Commander, and the general office was abolished.

sentences.zh: 御史大夫為大司空，封為列侯。

translations.literal: Imperial Secretary Grandee became Grand Minister of Works, enfeoffed as marquis.
translations.idiomatic: The Imperial Secretary Grandee became Grand Minister of Works and was enfeoffed as a marquis.

sentences.zh: 益大司馬、大司空奉如丞相。

translations.literal: Increased Grand Commander, Grand Minister of Works stipends like Chancellor.
translations.idiomatic: Increased the stipends of the Grand Commander and Grand Minister of Works like the Chancellor.

sentences.zh: 秋八月庚戌，中山王興薨。

translations.literal: Autumn eighth month Gengxu, Zhongshan King Xing passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On Gengxu of the eighth month of autumn, Zhongshan King Xing passed away.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月，立楚孝王孫景為定陶王。

translations.literal: Winter eleventh month, established Chu Filial King grandson Jing as Dingtao King.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month of winter, established Chu Filial King's grandson Jing as King of Dingtao.

sentences.zh: 定陵侯淳于長大逆不道，下獄死。

translations.literal: Dingling Marquis Chunyu Chang greatly rebellious not righteous, sent to prison died.
translations.idiomatic: Dingling Marquis Chunyu Chang was greatly rebellious and not righteous, sent to prison and died.

sentences.zh: 廷尉孔光使持節賜貴人許氏藥，飲藥死。

translations.literal: Commandant of Justice Kong Guang sent holding tally granted noble woman Xu clan medicine, drank medicine died.
translations.idiomatic: Commandant of Justice Kong Guang was sent holding tally to grant noble woman Xu medicine, and she drank the medicine and died.

sentences.zh: 十二月，罷部刺史，更置州牧，秩二千石。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, abolished prefecture inspectors, changed to establish provincial governors, rank 2000 piculs.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, prefecture inspectors were abolished and changed to establish provincial governors with rank of 2000 piculs.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，行幸甘泉，郊泰畤。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month, proceeded favored Ganquan, suburban Supreme Altar.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring in the second year, His Majesty proceeded to Ganquan and performed suburban sacrifices at the Supreme Altar.

sentences.zh: 二月壬子，丞相翟方進薨。

translations.literal: Second month Renzi, Chancellor Zhai Fangjin passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On Renzi of the second month, Chancellor Zhai Fangjin passed away.

sentences.zh: 三月，行幸河東，祠后土。

translations.literal: Third month, proceeded favored Hedong, sacrificed Houtu.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, His Majesty proceeded to Hedong and sacrificed to Houtu.

sentences.zh: 丙戌，帝崩于未央宮。

translations.literal: Bingxu, Emperor collapsed at Weiyang Palace.
translations.idiomatic: On Bingxu, the Emperor collapsed at Weiyang Palace.

sentences.zh: 皇太后詔有司復長安南北郊。

translations.literal: Empress Dowager edicted officials restore Chang'an north south suburbs.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Dowager edicted officials to restore the north and south suburbs of Chang'an.

sentences.zh: 四月己卯，葬延陵。

translations.literal: Fourth month Jimao, buried Yanling.
translations.idiomatic: On Jimao of the fourth month, buried at Yanling.

sentences.zh: 贊曰：臣之姑充後宮為婕妤，父子昆弟侍帷幄，數為臣言成帝善修容儀，升車正立，不內顧，不疾言，不親指，臨朝淵嘿，尊嚴若神，可謂穆穆天子之容者矣！

translations.literal: Praise said: minister paternal aunt filled rear palace as Lady, father sons brothers served curtains canopy, frequently spoke minister said Cheng Emperor good cultivate appearance conduct, ascended chariot upright stood, not inward looked back, not rapid spoke, not personally pointed, faced court deep silent, dignified like god, can call solemn solemn Son of Heaven appearance indeed!
translations.idiomatic: Praise says: The minister's paternal aunt filled the rear palace as a Lady, and father, sons, and brothers served the curtains and canopy. Frequently spoke to the minister saying that Emperor Cheng was good at cultivating his appearance and conduct—ascending the chariot he stood upright, not looking back inward, not speaking rapidly, not pointing personally, facing court in deep silence, dignified like a god—can truly be called the solemn and solemn appearance of the Son of Heaven!

sentences.zh: 博覽古今，容受直辭。

translations.literal: Broadly viewed ancient modern, contained received straightforward words.
translations.idiomatic: Broadly viewed ancient and modern, contained and received straightforward words.

sentences.zh: 公卿稱職，奏議可述。

translations.literal: Dukes ministers matched duties, memorials discussions describable.
translations.idiomatic: Dukes and ministers matched their duties, memorials and discussions were describable.

sentences.zh: 遭世承平，上下和睦。

translations.literal: Encountered world inherited peace, superiors inferiors harmonious friendly.
translations.idiomatic: Encountered a world of inherited peace, with superiors and inferiors harmonious and friendly.

sentences.zh: 然湛于酒色，趙氏亂內，外家擅朝，言之可為於邑。

translations.literal: However immersed in wine beauty, Zhao clan disordered inner, maternal family monopolized court, speak of it can cause sorrow sadness.
translations.idiomatic: However immersed in wine and beauty, the Zhao clan disordered the inner palace, the maternal family monopolized the court—speaking of it can cause sorrow and sadness.

sentences.zh: 建始以來，王氏始執國命，哀、平短祚，莽遂篡位，蓋其威福所由來者漸矣！

translations.literal: Jianshi since, Wang clan began grasped state fate, Ai, Ping short blessings, Mang then usurped position, cover his power blessing what from came gradually indeed!
translations.idiomatic: Since Jianshi, the Wang clan began to grasp the state's fate. Ai and Ping had short blessings, Mang then usurped the position—indeed his power and blessing came gradually!
